alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 9:02PM PST until February 28 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations less than 1 inch below 500 ft, and 1 to 2 inches above 500 feet. * WHERE...Central Willamette Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will vary between sea level and 1000 feet due to the showery nature of the precipitation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
